channel.title: [317][PI] Slayer Forced Text

item.title: [317][PI] Slayer Forced Text
item.dc:creator: @Felon Felon
item.description:
@Felon wrote:

I’m pretty new to rsps, so don’t quote me. and backup your file. lol.
But try…

if (c.slayerTask < Task(1)) { c.forcedText = "I do not have a slayer task ATM."; }

I just added parenthesis.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][PI] Slayer Forced Text
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

Ok i have been working on a server and the forced text when i don’t have a slayer text is “I must slay another 28 nothing.”
I want it to say when i dont have a task: “I dont have a slayer task ATM.”
So i added - if c.slayerTask < Task(1) { c.forcedText = "I do not have a slayer task ATM."; }
Right under - case 47130: c.forcedText = "I must slay another " + c.taskAmount + " " + Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(c.slayerTask) + "."; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true;
And i keep getting this error - src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1496: error: '(' expected if c.slayerTask < Task(1) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1496: error: ')' expected if c.slayerTask < Task(1) { ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
I cant figure it out…

Read full topic
